termAgree: By signing up you are agreed with our friendly
emailExist: Email already exists! Please enter another Email address!
connectivityException: Cannot get information from your actions, checkout your connectivity
serverUnexpectedError: Something got wrong with the Server! We are working to fix the problems! Please wait for the System Event Notification Service! Sorry for the inconvenience!
name: Full Name
passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 digits long!
passwordSpecialCharacter: Passwords must have at least one special character!
confirmPasswordNotMatch: The Password you entered do not match. Please re-enter your Password!
phoneValid: Please input valid Phone Number, which start with 0 and contains 10 or 11 digits only!
title: Title
connectTimeOUt: Your wifi maybe too slow to handle this request! Fix or Connect another wifi and try again!
m400: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error
m401: Maybe you submit the wrong Email or Password! Check it and try Login again!
m403: Forbidden! The client does not have access rights to the content!
m404: Not found! This page doesn't exists!
